option.name: External customer
option.description: Your customer for this work is a customer of the company.

option.name: Company
option.description: Your customer for this work is the whole company (or at least a number of groups within the company).

option.name: General employees
option.description: Your customer for this are employees.

option.name: My manager
option.description: The customer who benefits from this work is your manager.

option.name: My team
option.description: Your customer benefiting from work is your team.

option.name: Peers
option.description: Your customer is a peer.

option.name: Leaders
option.description: Your customer is leaders across the company

option.name: Executive staff
option.description: Your customer for this work is the executive staff (direct reports to CEO)

option.name: Functional group
option.description: Your customer for is a functional group that requires the work.

option.name: 3rd party
option.description: Your customer is a third party partner.

option.name: My self
option.description: Your primary customer of this work is yourself

option.name: Other
option.description: Your customer for this work is someone other than the options provided.

option.name: Revenue generation
option.description: Directly impacts revenue generation

option.name: Profitability
option.description: Directly impacts the profit of the company (saves cost, reduces waste, streamlines, makes org more efficient)

option.name: Customer satisfaction
option.description: Directly impacts customer satisfaction

option.name: Employee satisfaction
option.description: Directly impacts employee satisfaction

option.name: Risk management
option.description: Directly impacts risk reduction for the company

option.name: Other
option.description: Other impact

option.name: Core
option.description: Requires a basic to modest level of training and/or experience to adequately deliver work

option.name: Skilled
option.description: Requires skilled problem-solving based on years of relevant knowledge or experience to adequately deliver work

option.name: Expert
option.description: Requires expert-level talent with hard-to-replace analytical, contextual or strategic experience

option.name: The work is working well
option.description: This work does not need improving

option.name: The work needs improving
option.description: This work does need improving

option.name: Environmental / team dynamics impacting work effectiveness
option.description: There is something going on in the environment or within the team that is having a negative impact on the quality/effectiveness of the work (e.g. toxic environment, exclusion/lack of belonging, poor leadership....)

option.name: Improvement is in process
option.description: A project is underway to improve this work

option.name: I want to lead improving this work
option.description: I want to lead or participate in improving this work

option.name: Work could be automated / autsourced
option.description: Some or all of this work could be automated/outsourced

option.name: Work not needed / not adding value
option.description: This work is not needed; can be eliminated

option.name: I am fully capable and confident
option.description: I am confident and capable in performing this work

option.name: This work offers me an opportunity to grow
option.description: I am learning and growing from this work

option.name: This is a stretch for me; need additional support
option.description: I want to improve my ability to perform this work and need additional support

option.name: My talent is NOT aligned with this work
option.description: My skills or strengths aren't aligned to perform this work

option.name: There is another person I know, which is better suited
option.description: I may or not be capable of doing this work, but there is someone who would be better (either because they really want to do it or just have the talent)

option.name: Enjoy this work; would like to keep doing it
option.description: I enjoy this work; would like to keep doing it

option.name: Enjoy this work; would like to do more of it
option.description: I enjoy this work; would like to do more of it

option.name: Dislike this work; would prefer not to do it
option.description: Dislike this work; would prefer not to do it

option.name: Been there done that; I am not learning or growing
option.description: Been there done that; I am not learning or growing

option.name: Would like to train / mentor others to do this work
option.description: I would like to train/mentor others to do this work

option.name: Specific project that is completed / no longer needed
option.description: This was work or a task that no longer needs to be done; only needed to be completed once

option.name: Not doing this, but would like to in the future
option.description: I am not doing this, but would like to in the future
